controller

Class RutinaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RutinaController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE})
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/rutina")
public class RutinaController
extends Object
